citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:42 PM on
1/7/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and speaking to a family member who
stated the licensee was not home and calling the licensee and leaving a message. Failure to provide access to the facility,
animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in
enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:42 PM on 
1/7/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and speaking to a family member who 
stated the licensee was not home and calling the licensee and leaving a message. Failure to provide access to the facility, 
animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in 
enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
